document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">little </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c478ff">Parasol </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#18ff86">lift </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">once </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">let </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">down </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">whole </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c478ff">Responsibility </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#98ff24">imitate, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Mine </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#98ff24">Summer </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">further </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">must </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">wear, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44c4ff">Content </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">if </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#98ff24">Nature's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#98ff24">Drawer </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c478ff">Present </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Me </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">from </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#98ff24">sepulchral </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#bce454">Crease </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">As </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#98ff24">blemishless, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Her little parasol to lift
